pr_title: Add yaml as text based media type

timeline.message:
Add yaml as text based media type

so that it can be compressed when served.

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why only x-yaml is checked?
timeline.author: graemerocher

replies.bodyText: Well the media type is application/x-yaml and text/yaml will be matched by the textTypePatterns.
replies.author: croudet

replies.bodyText:
I can add a pattern if you want:
textTypePatterns.add(Pattern.compile("^.*\\+yaml$"));
replies.author: croudet
